title: Sussur Greatsword
content:
Sussur Greatsword Rare 3~13 Damage 2d6 +1 Slashing Silences targets on hit. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Sussur roots extend from this sword's hilt into the blade itself. It yearns to drink magic, silencing every creature it strikes. Greatsword Two-Handed 2.7 150
